players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and Bob is mafia. We need to act fast."
Diana: "I'm sorry, but I don't have enough information to make an accusation. However, I will keep an eye on Bob and Charlie."
Charlie: "I will continue to monitor Bob and Charlie. Let's gather more information before making any accusations."
You: "I'm just a poor, innocent villager. I had nothing to do with Alice's murder."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
